page.title: 13PLAYGROUND GAMES (2)
page.content: {STICKY TOFFEE}: In Sticky Toffee one person is{ IT }and their task is to catch the people who are not. When anyone is caught they must stay still until touched by another person who is not{IT.}They then continue as normal. { {MARBLES}:They are very popular at Hartlip school,but we do not play it in the usual way.We have 2 drain lids to play on.The aim of the game is to get a marble into the dip in the middle of the drain.If it goes off the lid both players have to begin again.We have 2 drain lids,one with 2 dips so 3 games can be played at once.We do play free ground too.There are many tactics,flicks,bombs,stops and rebounds.Marbles is a very serious game!
